website_summaries.verdict: More affordable than other more traditional executive chairs. Great budget option.
pros: Good construction and build quality for the price
Simple to assemble and set up before use
cons: Wheels often bind up on carpet

customer_reviews.title: Chair is not of high quality and, after a ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair is not of high quality and, after a month of use, developed a crack in the wheel base causing the support cylinder to drop and scratch our wooden floors. The fabric has begun to separate from the underside of the chair, and the decorative pieces on the arm rest keep peeling off. Barton has not responded to our request for replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: John Enforcer

customer_reviews.title: This chair looks exactly like the picture HOWEVER the "chrome" is nothing more than ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks exactly like the picture HOWEVER the "chrome" is nothing more than silver plastic. The bolts provided to assemble the chair are entirely too short to support any weight for the rated usage, however, the independent purchase of longer bolts has made the chair usable. I am only keeping it because it would cost too much to ship it back for a refund. I would not buy this chair if you have other options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This chair looks and feels great until you sit in it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair after endless hours of searching and reading review after review. The fact that this chair only had 1 review should have been a red flag, but because I was so over the whole process, I settled on this one and I do mean settled! This chair looks and feels great until you sit in it. There is absolutely no lower lumbar support, at all! This is the most uncomfortable chair I have ever sat in. DO NOT waste your money on this one. The previous reviewer stated that she received the chair at a discounted price in exchange for her honest review, but I think her honest review was influenced by the discount she received! #junk!
customer_reviews.author: TAM'S UNIQUE BOUTIQUE

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this chair literally everyday for 3-8 hours a day. Extremely comfy and well made. I have had back problems because of ill-supported chairs in the past, but that is definitely not an issue here. It also rolls very well over carpet. Very happy with this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair. bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: Looks new, easy to put together and it is pretty nice to sit in. But the smell though almost gone now lasted for weeks. But for under $70 its a fine chair
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: If your just buying it for looks then you are good otherwise it is simply disposable
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. this is a gorgeous chair however the bottom completely fell out of it after approximately 6 months. If your just buying it for looks then you are good otherwise it is simply disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easily assembled, arms are made of plastic but a ...
customer_reviews.text: chairs comfy , easily assembled, arms are made of plastic but a little over an inch thick the foam in the arm rests isnt sturdy and broke down with in the week on the arm i use my mouse with.but overall its a nice chair would buy again
customer_reviews.author: aaron torrence

customer_reviews.title: GAVE THE WRONG CHAIR A GREAT REVIEW. THIS IS THE ONE I WAS TRYING ...
customer_reviews.text: GAVE THE WRONG CHAIR A GREAT REVIEW. THIS IS THE ONE I WAS TRYING TO REVIEW. SEEMS GREAT, SO FAR.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Keck

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together but it isn't the most comfy
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together but it isn't the most comfy, actually it's barely comfortable. If your in a pinch it will do but if you want quality, this product isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mariann Vasquez/Anthony Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Chair this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It came right to the door. It's the same chair we saw elsewhere and at a better price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M Rubio

customer_reviews.title: love it. easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: love it. easy to assemble. very comfortable. i would recommend this chair to anyone looking for a computer chair. love the high back
customer_reviews.author: psilocke

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my chair about a week ago and so far I have had no issues. Included were all of the parts I needed and the required allen wrench. The chair feels solid and is very comfortable. The only issue I have is that the material feels thin and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the $$$!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very comfortable, affordable, and the brown is so different from the usual black!
customer_reviews.author: Mouse362

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible strong smell - bolts were already stripped before even beginning assembly. Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bieker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Left plastic arm broke while leaning back. Not heavy duty as described. Will not purchase anything from manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arm came cracked and screws didn't line up good with holes making difficult to assemble. Purchased 2.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Need to adjust the back
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and comfortable but I wish there was a way to adjust the back support. The default position is somewhat far for me..
customer_reviews.author: Theodros Gebremichael

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had this chair less than a year and the arm broke off causing me to fallout of it.
customer_reviews.author: MHaynes in New Bern, NC

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell efter days of use and not as big ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell efter days of use and not as big and tall as advertised. The back is just to your shoulders not all the way up to your head.
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: The chair is extremely comfortable and very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The chair is extremely comfortable and very easy to assemble. My sixteen year old son put it together. Blends in and matches perfect with my livingroom/office decor. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great strong chair for big person love. Only complaint a little hard to put together, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Peterson

customer_reviews.title: just like the one pictured
customer_reviews.text: ordered the chair with arms, just like the one pictured. No arms in box, called the manufacturer. No response at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it
customer_reviews.text: Chair is cheaply made but I guess you get what you pay for. Would have returned but USPS shipping cost is almost the cost of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a birthday gift for my mom cause she ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my mom cause she was complaining about her old chair. She loves this chair and has made everyone else at her office jealous of her new comfy seat
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Received the chair today. Was a pain to put together. The price was nice but as they say you get what you pay for, this chair is so uncomfortable, I have been sitting in it on and off for 4hrs and my bottom hurts, The back is not comfortable either. Very hard, looked soft in picture. You would be better off going for a different chair.
customer_reviews.author: moonglow67

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair. It was a bit of a challenge to assemble because the screws didn't line up with holes but it all came together nicely. I love the look and support of this chair. I thought it was reasonably price. I know I will get a lot of use from this chair for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: This chair is wonderful looks great with brushed aluminum although made of plasitic ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is wonderful looks great with brushed aluminum although made of plasitic on the arms and base. I replaced the wheels with the ToolKee Rollerblade Office Chair Wheels Casters which are large and roll much better. Many people simply buy a chair in this price band and complain but if you add the wheels its easily a chair worth a hundred more. I also suggest buying two achieving a partners desk even with smaller desk sets.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smiley

customer_reviews.title: The arm broke on the right side within 45 day ...
customer_reviews.text: The arm broke on the right side within 45 day of receiving the chair, the arm cushions were stripped out and had to have new sent from vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Big Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and at an incredibly affordable price, this is a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Murphree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and attractive looking chair! Great quality! Took a while for the new smell to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Picasso

product_meta.title: Office Chair with PU Leather Back Support Big&Tall High-Back Computer Desk Chair -Brown
product_meta.description:
● One-touch adjustable seat height 

● Multiple adjustments put you in control of the seat's position 

● Meets and/or exceeds applicable ANSI/BIFMA performance standards 

● 360 degree swivel ability for convenience

● Smooth gliding casters for increasing comfort and mobility

● Waterfall seat cushion slopes slightly downward to help reduce stress on your legs 

● Adjustable Height 17"- 20"

● Assembly required 

Package Includes: 

● Executive Office Chair 

● Installation Hardware

● Installation Tool

● Installation Manual
feature_bullets: Padded chrome arms help support your shoulders and upper body
Large, oversized cushioning is plush and comfortable
Recommended for intensive use 6-8 hours per day

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars76 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
